esql_examples: FROM products | WHERE product_description LIKE "*wireless*" | LIMIT 10
FROM products | WHERE product_name LIKE "*premium*" | KEEP product_name, product_price | SORT product_price DESC
products.esql_note: ES|QL uses DOUBLE QUOTES for string literals, NOT single quotes
products.term_query_note: Term queries require EXACT matches. Use values from keyword_field_values.

esql_examples: FROM product_reviews | WHERE review_text LIKE "*comfortable*" | LIMIT 10
FROM product_reviews | WHERE review_text LIKE "*durable*" OR review_text LIKE "*comfortable*" | KEEP review_title, review_rating | SORT review_rating DESC
product_reviews.esql_note: ES|QL uses DOUBLE QUOTES for string literals, NOT single quotes
product_reviews.term_query_note: Term queries require EXACT matches. Use values from keyword_field_values. Note: verified_purchase uses string 'True'/'False', not boolean.

esql_examples: FROM product_users | WHERE interests LIKE "*Electronics*" | LIMIT 10
FROM product_users | WHERE interests LIKE "*Books*" OR interests LIKE "*Electronics*" | KEEP username, interests | LIMIT 10
product_users.esql_note: ES|QL uses DOUBLE QUOTES for string literals, NOT single quotes
product_users.term_query_note: Term queries require EXACT matches. account_type values are capitalized (e.g., 'Premium' not 'premium').
